about_the_game:
Kill Dee is a super interesting 2D linear platformer with a super exciting stories. There are 2 branches of stories that closely intersect and will intersect in the future. In each story you play as the main character.

Graphic style is very simple and cartoon stylized.

Playtime of this game could last from 1 to 3 hours. It depends on you because some levels could be difficult. 

  • First story speaks of John Walker. His wife was kidnapped by "LoveHat Gang". You are trying to find her and save but you will have many enemies on your way. You have to talk (interact) to NPCs to figure out what you have to do next (on the level) and get closer to your purpose.

  • Second story speaks of Boris. He has a similar trouble as John - his son was kidnapped by the same gang. He also tries to find his close relative slaying all on his way. You have to talk (interact) to NPCs to figure out what you have to do next (on the level) and get closer to your purpose.

    Both main heroes have a close attack weapon and a long range weapon. Some protagonists possess a powerful special attack.

    Experience joy, sadness and inspiration in a world you will never forget.
    P.S If you have any question or troubles with the game - write to me on Steam -

content_descriptors.notes: Kill Dee includes fantasy stickman violence, use of tabak(cigarettes).

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: mac OS 10.0.4
  • Processor: Intel CORE™ I5 13600KF
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1 Max
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: mac OS 10.10.5
  • Processor: Intel CORE™ I9 14900KF
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M2 Ultra
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

name: Kill Dee

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas lícitas
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos

short_description: Kill Dee is a super interesting platformer with a very exciting story. It is a mix of parkour and fighting. The game changes the gameplay from level to level, but mainly it is a platform game. It contains 2 storylines.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Ukrainian*
*languages with full audio support
